titleStmt.title: Marie by the grace of God, Quene of Englande, Fraunce, and Irelande, defendour of the faith, and in the earth supreme hed [sic] of the Churches of Englãd and Irelande to all our most louing, faithfull, and obedient subiectes greting.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1553-1558 : Mary I)
Mary I, Queen of England, 1516-1558.

publicationStmt.publisher: In ædibus Richardi Graftoni Reginæa typographia excusum,

notesStmt.note: "Dated at London the xix. daie of Julie, in the first yere of our reigne."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
